description.value:
A Massive, heavily armed servitor mounted on tracks or other highly augmented chassis. An almost perfect body guard or instrument of war. Can be equipped with any two of: Breacher, Chain Axe, Electro-Flail, Flamer, Heavy Bolter, Heavy Stubber, Melta Gun, Missile Launcher (Krak/Frag), Plasma Gun, or Webber. (Cost not included, but acquisition is).

Requirements

Does not include costs of weapons it uses. Only Acquirable by Tech Priests See Bestiary/InqHandbook Pg 141.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: 35000 T
